content:
User: Review and Refine: Keep an eye on the new tags DeepSearch generates. If it starts adding tags that don’t fit (unlikely, but possible), you can tweak the instructions in the next prompt.

Grok: You’re already halfway through Segment 1of4, so once you’re done with this, move to Segment 2of4 and keep the momentum going. If you hit any snags, I’m here to troubleshoot.
